artist: Artist @L[Core:Tradecrafts]{checks} can be used to create and evaluate works of art.
blacksmith: Blacksmith @L[Core:Tradecrafts]{checks} can be used to forge @L[Category:Armor]{armor}, @L[Category:Weapons]{weapons}, and other metal goods. It can also be used to understand the make and quality of metal @L[Category:Equipment]{items}.
builder: Builder @L[Core:Tradecrafts]{checks} can be used to build and repair wooden or stone objects and structures. It can also be used to understand the make and quality of such objects and structures.
cartographer: Cartographer @L[Core:Tradecrafts]{checks} can be used to navigate and read or make maps.
chef: Chef @L[Core:Tradecrafts]{checks} can be used to cook, prepare, serve, and evaluate food.
courtier: Courtier @L[Core:Tradecrafts]{checks} can be used to befriend, manipulate, and deceive, and adjust the attitudes of other cratures.
diplomat: Diplomat @L[Core:Tradecrafts]{checks} can be used to understand the law and navigate the political landscape.
enforcer: Enforcer @L[Core:Tradecrafts]{checks} can be used to intimidate others and appear authoritative.
farmer: Farmer @L[Core:Tradecrafts]{checks} can be used to grow and tend crops or gardens to produce food. It can also be used to recognize edible plants.
gambler: Gambler @L[Core:Tradecrafts]{checks} can be used to play games of skill or luck and assess the odds of things.
herbalist: Herbalist @L[Core:Tradecrafts]{checks} can be used to gather herbs and prepare herbal remedies. It can also be used to apply basic medicine to other creatures.
historian: Historian @L[Core:Tradecrafts]{checks} can be used to research and understand past events as well as the people, places, and items associated with them.
hunter: Hunter @L[Core:Tradecrafts]{checks} can be used to trap or hunt animals for food and hides. It can also be used to know what parts of animals are useful for different purposes.
innkeeper: Innkeeper @L[Core:Tradecrafts]{checks} can be used to find information about other people and hear or spread rumors.
investigator: Investigator @L[Core:Tradecrafts]{checks} can be used to search areas for hidden objects. It can also be used to hide objects.
locksmith: Locksmith @L[Core:Tradecrafts]{checks} can be used to assemble, pick, and evaluate locks.
mariner: Mariner @L[Core:Tradecrafts]{checks} can be used to sail and understand @L[Category:Ship target abilities]{ships} and the sea. It can also be used to understand the workings of ships and how to repair them.
messenger: Messenger @L[Core:Tradecrafts]{checks} can be used to recall words, phrases, and other information you have encountered previously.
metaphysicist: Metaphysicist @L[Core:Tradecrafts]{checks} can be used to recognize and interpret arcane features of the world. Although this @L[Core:Tradecrafts]{tradecraft} may often come up, it is not standardly learnable.
miner: Miner @L[Core:Tradecrafts]{checks} can be used to find your way in or out of caves and dungeons. It can also be used to understand the properties of minerals and ores.
peacekeeper: Peacekeeper @L[Core:Tradecrafts]{checks} can be used to know if other creatures are attempting to lie or deceive you.
performer: Performer @L[Core:Tradecrafts]{checks} can be used to impress, entertain, and distract other creatures. It can also be used to recognize or evaluate the quality of performances.
priest: Priest @L[Core:Tradecrafts]{checks} can be used to tend shrines or temples and understand theology.
scribe: Scribe @L[Core:Tradecrafts]{checks} can be used to speak, read, and write in Common or other languages.
tailor: Tailor @L[Core:Tradecrafts]{checks} can be used to sew and repair clothing and other cloth @L[Category:Equipment]{items}. It can also be used to understand the make and quality of cloth @L[Category:Equipment]{items}.
tamer: Tamer @L[Core:Tradecrafts]{checks} can be used to tame, calm, or rile up wild and domesticated animals. It can also be used to intuit an animal's intentions.
teacher: Teacher @L[Core:Tradecrafts]{checks} can be used to train others and share your knowledge.
tracker: Tracker @L[Core:Tradecrafts]{checks} can be used to find your way in the wild and follow or evade others.
trader: Trader @L[Core:Tradecrafts]{checks} can be used to make deals with other creatures and find opportunities to trade that wouldn't otherwise be available.
